H0.text: The Big Bang is the theory that states that the universe originated as a single mass.

H1.text: Steady State is the theory that states that the universe originated as a single mass.

H2.text: Astronomical is the theory that states that the universe originated as a single mass.

H3.text: Catastrophism is the theory that states that the universe originated as a single mass.

A4.text: The discovery and confirmation of the CMB in 1964 secured the Big Bang as the best theory of the origin and evolution of the universe.

A5.text: Observational evidence, most notably from radio source counts, began to favor Big Bang over steady state.
